title: Khel Ratna Award
summary: The Khel Ratna Award (Hindi pronunciation: [kʰeːl rət̪nə]), officially known as the Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna Award (transl. Major Dhyan Chand Sport Jewel Award), formerly known as the Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Award in Sports and Games,[1][2][3][4] is the highest sporting honour of India.[5] It is awarded annually by the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports.
